channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Disruptor (Neutral Offensive)
channel.description:
This is a test take, so it's a WIP
>## [color=grey]The Disruptor[/color] > [color=grey]Neutral Offensive[/color] _Win Condition: Win with the Neutral Killer. Cannot spawn with the Inquisitor and Sorcerer._ Traitorous (Passive): Immune to target changing and death at night. Deranged (Passive): You will know if the Neutral Killer visited you. If the Neutral Killer dies, you will end your life. Silence (Day): Silence a player for 30 seconds. They will not be able to hear anyone or vote in a trial while silenced. (2 uses) Disrupt (Night): Disrupt a player, forcing them to target you. You will appear to be a **[color=blue]Drunk[/color]** to investigators that you force to target. (Infinite Uses) Disorder (Night): Force 2 players to target each other. If one of the players is the Neutral Killer, their ability will bypass everything. (3 Uses.)
> **Conversion Immune**
Tell me what you think! This hopefully addresses the current problem of NK being too hard to win as, as NKs require more effort to win as than any other class in the game.
(I could make some classes for FoL as well, tell me if you guys want some FoL Classes :3)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Disruptor (Neutral Offensive)
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Firelitten:

If it wins even if it dies I would change it to a 1 night immunity. Meaning the first time you are attacked you are immune for the rest of the night. Basically survives the night. But make sure NK can’t kill him

This is what I was thinking. However, if the NK was somehow prevented from attacking the person (Wasting a night on this little class), it’s kinda bad for NK.

(More souls for reaper? :3)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Disruptor (Neutral Offensive)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Does it win if the NK wins or only if it survives with the NK

If it wins even if it dies I would change it to a 1 night immunity. Meaning the first time you are attacked you are immune for the rest of the night. Basically survives the night. But make sure NK can’t kill him

If he doesn’t win keep the perm night immunity

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Disruptor (Neutral Offensive)
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
This is a test take, so it’s a WIP

The Disruptor

Neutral Offensive
Win Condition: Win with the Neutral Killer. Cannot spawn with the Inquisitor and Sorcerer.
Traitorous (Passive): Immune to target changing and death at night.
Deranged (Passive): You will know if the Neutral Killer visited you. If the Neutral Killer dies, you will end your life.
Silence (Day): Silence a player for 30 seconds. They will not be able to hear anyone or vote in a trial while silenced. (2 uses)
Disrupt (Night): Disrupt a player, forcing them to target you. You will appear to be a Drunk to investigators that you force to target. (Infinite Uses)
Disorder (Night): Force 2 players to target each other. If one of the players is the Neutral Killer, their ability will bypass everything. (3 Uses.)

Conversion Immune

Tell me what you think! This hopefully addresses the current problem of NK being too hard to win as, as NKs require more effort to win as than any other class in the game.

(I could make some classes for FoL as well, tell me if you guys want some FoL Classes :3)

Read full topic
